data.name: description
data.label: New Description
data.help: Add a thorough description with as much detail as possible. You can use [Markdown](https://daringfireball.net/projects/markdown/basics).

data.name: timeout
data.label: Timeout
data.help: Define how long buyers should be able to download the dataset again after the initial purchase.

data.name: author
data.label: New Author
data.help: Give proper attribution for your dataset.

data.name: paymentCollector
data.label: Payment Collector Address
data.help: This address will receive the revenue from all sales. More info available in our [docs](https://docs.oceanprotocol.com/core-concepts/datanft-and-datatoken#revenue).

data.name: assetState
data.label: Asset Status
data.help: This asset will no longer be visible to other users and it won't be possible to purchase it.  More info available in our [docs](https://docs.oceanprotocol.com/core-concepts/did-ddo#state).
